### Your access token: `"bb-admin"`

Record this token somewhere secure, it can't be viewed or retrieved once you close this window.
```bash
ATCT&ZeroWidthSpace;T3xFfGN0rHjIthXtTh2z9Ql6af2EJWA3xlHtFUKTdusM2tf2bbdBqbnXvpSh8BanZGCxvovr1HOv-9wqfOp-9DBH4eEUddFkNVGLC6krlFcaPbKU0XhT42P8VD91Hj59MJMmPEXQBj3pr52RVI9mKDLlZGQe2VsEmJ6C-b0h2e4lZBQNzi8=2EC042F6
```

How to use this token with APIs
Provide this token in the Authorization header as a bearer token when making requests to Bitbucket APIs, for example:
```bash
Authorization: Bearer ATCT&ZeroWidthSpace;T3xFfGN0rHjIthXtTh2z9Ql6af2EJWA3xlHtFUKTdusM2tf2bbdBqbnXvpSh8BanZGCxvovr1HOv-9wqfOp-9DBH4eEUddFkNVGLC6krlFcaPbKU0XhT42P8VD91Hj59MJMmPEXQBj3pr52RVI9mKDLlZGQe2VsEmJ6C-b0h2e4lZBQNzi8=2EC042F6
```

How to use this token with your Git repository
To clone this repository using this token, run:
```bash
git clone https://x-token-auth:ATCT&ZeroWidthSpace;T3xFfGN0rHjIthXtTh2z9Ql6af2EJWA3xlHtFUKTdusM2tf2bbdBqbnXvpSh8BanZGCxvovr1HOv-9wqfOp-9DBH4eEUddFkNVGLC6krlFcaPbKU0XhT42P8VD91Hj59MJMmPEXQBj3pr52RVI9mKDLlZGQe2VsEmJ6C-b0h2e4lZBQNzi8=2EC042F6@bitbucket.org/aleksey-kurmanov/students-db.git
```

To use this token to push code to this repository, set the Git author on the cloned repository by running the following code snippet in your terminal:
```bash
git config user.email gn6qnviqutgxfac3d7bh87o5khtj1u@bots.bitbucket.org
```
